title: Plush
description: The moment I met my new roommate, I knew there was something different about him. Not just that fact that he was devastatingly handsome, but there was a side of him I wasn’t allowed to see.Until one weekend, when he discovered my naughty little secret, he decided to show me a wild side to him that I’d never expected.CONTAINS: FURRY, ROLE-PLAYING, PLUSHOPHILE, M/F/MPlush is a novella in the Quick and Dirty Series. If you like a short and sweet story with instalove and a happily ever after, this book is for you. Every book in the series is completely standalone. Be warned – the sex in this is raw and taboo. It is not for the faint of heart. Now dive in, you dirty little kitten.
author: Nova Monroe
